name: ThinkBIG.LearnSmart
tag_list: adobe-training-classes, apple-training-classes, elearning, web-development-training, web-development, custom-training, project-based-training, html5-training
overview:
ThinkBIG is an Adobe Authorized training center offering Adobe, Apple, Articulate, Web Development and eLearning classes. All classes are available at our location in Columbia, MD, at a client’s location privately, or virtually online live. ThinkBIG also specializes in eLearning and Web/Mobile development projects.

ThinkB!G focuses on educating multimedia career professionals and developing technology Trainers through offering Comptia Certified Technology Trainer (CTT+) training program. We help organizations build the skills of their workforce. With Certification being critical to validating skills, ThinkB!G only uses Certified Instructors and Official Curriculum offered by technology vendors.

With a passion to assist organizations in implementing a learning strategy to increase the knowledge of workforce professionals, ThinkBIGLearnSmart works with executive management to design training solutions that scale training worldwide that is also measurable. ThinkBIGLearnSmart has served clients such as Department of Defense, U.S. Department of Agriculture, NASA, Johns Hopkins, SSA Social Security Administration, University of Maryland, Howard Community College, UnderArmour, Mid-Atlantic Sports Network, Legg Mason, 1st Mariner Bank, Maxim Health and many others.
